post.author: 윤만호
post.content:
CSR / Operation Assistant

RS Canada Inc. has a full time position for an experienced CSR and Admin assistant.

Customer Service duties include handling incoming calls and recommending products.
Administration duties include data entry and inventory management.

Successful candidates MUST have:
- Good communication skills, both verbal and written
- Familiar with MS office products
- Minimum 1 year of CSR experience in sales

For immediate consideration, please forward resume with salary requirements to

jamespark@royalsovereign.com.

Visit us at www.royalsovereign.com
post.title: CSR / Operation Assistant
